metadata.title: CVE-2018-20337 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
There is a stack-based buffer overflow in the parse_makernote function of dcraw_common.cpp in LibRaw 0.19.1. Crafted input will lead to a denial of service or possibly unspecified other impact.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-20337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libraw-bin - 0.19.2-2
libraw20 - 0.19.2-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: darktable package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
dcraw package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
exactimage package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
kodi package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
libraw package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.19.2-2').
rawtherapee package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
